posts.title: Welcome to Our Blog

posts.body: In this post, we’ll walk through the basics of React including components, props, and state management.

posts.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
posts.body: Closures are a powerful feature in JavaScript. This guide explains how they work and when to use them.

posts.title: Fitness & Focus
posts.body: Starting your day with a workout can improve your mood and productivity. Here's how to stay consistent.

posts.body: You're doing great! Keep pushing forward — every small effort counts toward your goals.

posts.body: Learn how to scaffold a modern React application using Create React App and best practices.
